channel.title: Introduction on Mr. B0b Hacking Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Mr. B0b Hacking Blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hey! 👋 I’m mrb0b173 and this is my first post.

Welcome to my little corner of the internet where I’ll be sharing my journey in cybersecurity, pentesting, ethical hacking, and sometimes cryptography.
Here you’ll find CTF writeups, tips, and notes on techniques I’m learning along the way.

Excited to start this adventure — let’s hack (ethically) together! 🔐
